name: MindMelder
description:
** IF THE GAME DOESN'T LOAD, TRY USING MICROSOFT EDGE OR FIREFOX **

You are a parasite who can join their mind together with various hosts. Each host provides useful skills you need to utilize to escape the research laboratory.

Movement: WASD/ARROW KEYS + mouse
Possess: Mouse Right-click
Interact: Mouse Left-click

In a secret international research station hidden somewhere beneath the cold frozen hellscape of Antarctica experiments are being conducted on an alien lifeform that can infiltrate the minds of men. A security breach in the lowest level of the facility allows the alien parasite to latch onto a rodent to escape captivity.
